video.title: Knight Rider
video.synopsis: Left for dead but saved by a mystery benefactor, Michael Knight has a new face, a new mission and a new car: a Trans Am with a voice of its own.

episodes.synopsis: Det. Michael Long is apparently killed in a botched stakeout. At the request of a wealthy benefactor, he receives a new face and identity.
episodes.title: Knight of the Phoenix: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Michael Knight meets K.I.T.T., Knight Industries' bulletproof intelligent car that can reach speeds over 300 mph.
episodes.title: Knight of the Phoenix: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Michael gives an Army lieutenant a lift back to her base, where they discover that her father, a colonel, has been killed.
episodes.title: Deadly Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: Michael's vacation in Whiterock is put on hold when two rival biker gangs descend on the little town, terrorizing the locals.
episodes.title: Good Day at White Rock

episodes.synopsis: Michael joins a traveling car stunt show to expose a scam that's sent several drivers to an untimely end.
episodes.title: Slammin' Sammy's Stunt Show Spectacular

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. protect one of Devon's friends, a prominent senator, whose life has been threatened for her stance on a political issue.
episodes.title: Just My Bill

episodes.synopsis: A family's future is threatened by a neighboring rancher who's diverting water to his own land. Michael and K.I.T.T. step in to settle the issue.
episodes.title: Not a Drop to Drink

episodes.synopsis: When Devon lands in a small-town jail after being wrongly accused of speeding, he witnesses the murder of his cellmate at the hands of police.
episodes.title: No Big Thing

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. race to stop K.A.R.R., a malevolent prototype of K.I.T.T. that's killing everything that stands in its way.
episodes.title: Trust Doesn't Rust

episodes.synopsis: Michael goes undercover to join a renegade retired colonel and his band of thieves, hoping to undermine their plans of pulling off a major gold heist.
episodes.title: Inside Out

episodes.synopsis: A shy bookkeeper, on the run after being caught embezzling, holds the key to a murder. But Michael and K.I.T.T. have to find him before the cops do.
episodes.title: The Final Verdict

episodes.synopsis: Someone is assassinating visiting third-world leaders, and Michael goes undercover at a chauffeur school to root out the killer.
episodes.title: A Plush Ride

episodes.synopsis: Michael meets a woman who knows the details of an assassination plot, but her amnesia makes getting the information something of a challenge.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: Michael goes undercover to infiltrate the Corazon de Piedras, a syndicate that's selling illegal high-tech arms in Central America.
episodes.title: Hearts of Stone

episodes.synopsis: In order to uncover a sabotage plot, Michael enters K.I.T.T. in a race for cars that use alternative fuels.
episodes.title: Give Me Liberty... or Give Me Death

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. travel to Las Vegas to investigate the mysterious death of a publisher whose magazine was about to print a damaging exposé.
episodes.title: The Topaz Connection

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. track a counterfeiter to a town whose citizens seem to be harboring the fugitive. The CIA is also monitoring the village.
episodes.title: A Nice, Indecent Little Town

episodes.synopsis: Several members of a club for geniuses are murdered, and the trail leads Michael and K.I.T.T. to the site of a seemingly unrelated archaeological dig.
episodes.title: Chariot of Gold

episodes.synopsis: An attorney's aide blows the whistle on a corrupt company, and Michael steps in to protect her until she can make her case.
episodes.title: White Bird

episodes.synopsis: Pirates are hijacking the cargoes of independent truckers, and Michael and K.I.T.T. set out to stop the ruthless entity that's behind the thievery.
episodes.title: Knight Moves

episodes.synopsis: While trying to uncover the mastermind behind a computer software theft, Michael tangles with a gung-ho private eye investigating the same case.
episodes.title: Nobody Does It Better

episodes.synopsis: When Michael kills a member of a biker gang, only one witness can help him prove it was self-defense.
episodes.title: Short Notice

episodes.synopsis: Wilton Knight's son is a dead ringer for Michael, and his 18-wheeler, Goliath, is made from the same alloy as K.I.T.T. Let the showdown begin!
episodes.title: Goliath (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: K.I.T.T. is out of commission after Michael's encounter with Goliath, and the FLAG team hurries to rebuild him before Garthe can attack again.
episodes.title: Goliath (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: A terrorist is threatening to blow up a city, and only convict Peter McCord can stop him. Michael is planted in prison to help break him out.
episodes.title: Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. square off against a band of mercenaries who have stolen a high-tech military helicopter.
episodes.title: Merchants of Death

episodes.synopsis: With the aid of a young blind woman, Michael and K.I.T.T. track down an illegal immigrant who holds key evidence.
episodes.title: Blind Spot

episodes.synopsis: When an injured scuba diver washes up on shore, Michael and K.I.T.T. discover that the diver was after a cache of Aztec treasure in a sunken galleon.
episodes.title: Return to Cadiz

episodes.synopsis: Michael finds himself in competition with an obsessed cop when he attempts to foil a cat burglar. Geena Davis co-stars as the thief's daughter.
episodes.title: K.I.T.T. the Cat

episodes.synopsis: A ring of thieves is targeting customized cars, and K.I.T.T. proves to be the perfect bait in Michael's scheme to stop them.
episodes.title: Custom K.I.T.T.

episodes.synopsis: Michael's closest ally turns against him when a young computer wiz hacks into K.I.T.T.'s computer and wipes the memory.
episodes.title: Soul Survivor

episodes.synopsis: Michael pursues a crazed killer through the swampy bayou country, but he's hampered by K.I.T.T.'s technical malfunctions.
episodes.title: Ring of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Michael suffers a head injury during an investigation and believes he's still police lieutenant Michael Long, his former identity.
episodes.title: Knightmares

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. spend Christmas keeping a young gypsy boy safe from bank robbers whom he can identify.
episodes.title: Silent Knight

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. race to save a young woman who holds the key to a treasure sought by the man who killed her father.
episodes.title: A Knight in Shining Armor

episodes.synopsis: Michael journeys south of the border to thwart a sleazy talent agent who's using beautiful models to smuggle stolen diamonds into the United States.
episodes.title: Diamonds Aren't a Girl's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. investigate a string of burglaries in a small resort town.
episodes.title: White-Line Warriors

episodes.synopsis: April's daughter will die without a bone marrow transplant, and Michael frantically searches for a gang leader who's the only perfect match.
episodes.title: Race for Life

episodes.synopsis: An anonymous letter warns Michael and K.I.T.T. of a killer's plan to attack a charity motorcycle race being held by the Foundation.
episodes.title: Speed Demons

episodes.synopsis: Garthe Knight returns with a newly rebuilt Goliath for a rematch against Michael and K.I.T.T.
episodes.title: Goliath Returns (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Michael races against time to escape from Garthe Knight's mansion, expose his evil plot and destroy Goliath once and for all.
episodes.title: Goliath Returns (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: Attempting to retrieve plans that were stolen in a case of industrial espionage, Michael finds himself pursued by a sinister international criminal.
episodes.title: A Good Knight's Work

episodes.synopsis: When a lawyer is found murdered, Michael discovers that the man was investigating a smuggling operation dealing in illegal immigrants.
episodes.title: Mouth of the Snake (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: As his investigation into the smuggling operation continues, Michael stumbles upon a government cover-up involving experimental weapons.
episodes.title: Mouth of the Snake (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: Posing as a singer in a rock band, Michael looks for the connection between the former lead singer's death and an encoded video tape.
episodes.title: Let It Be Me

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T.'s investigation into the theft of heavy equipment from a financially strapped contractor lands them in the bottom of a quarry.
episodes.title: Big Iron

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. reunite with an old colleague, Bonnie, to stop a group of high-tech thieves from breaking into a bank.
episodes.title: Knight of the Drones: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Michael, K.I.T.T. and Bonnie close in on the thieves, they discover that the crooks' true target is a top-secret weapons installation.
episodes.title: Knight of the Drones: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a fortune in diamonds is stolen from a charity auction, Michael and K.I.T.T. track the thieves to a Napa Valley winery.
episodes.title: The Ice Bandits

episodes.synopsis: When Michael learns that a friend has been injured in a hit-and-run incident, he competes in an illegal street race to flush out the culprits.
episodes.title: Knights of the Fast Lane

episodes.synopsis: Halloween is approaching, and witches, gremlins and ghostly images abound. So when Bonnie witnesses a murder, nobody believes her... at first.
episodes.title: Halloween Knight

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. meet their match in a seemingly indestructible adversary: K.A.R.R., K.I.T.T.'s alter ego.
episodes.title: K.I.T.T. vs. K.A.R.R.

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. go Western when they descend upon Sage City to help Rebecca Hammond stop the cattle rustling on her ranch.
episodes.title: The Rotten Apples

episodes.synopsis: Michael is framed and must clear his name while stopping a madman's sale of a biological warfare agent.
episodes.title: Knight in Disgrace

episodes.synopsis: When Michael's friend, Sydney, accidentally ingests poison meant for him, he and K.I.T.T. race to Mexico to find the assassin and secure the antidote.
episodes.title: Dead of Knight

episodes.synopsis: After a giant explosion damages K.I.T.T.'s memory, a young boy finds K.I.T.T. roaming the streets, and the two team up against a gang of thieves.
episodes.title: Lost Knight

episodes.synopsis: Michael poses as a mercenary to track down the elusive Chameleon, a master of disguise who stole government weapons with intentions to sell them.
episodes.title: Knight of the Chameleon

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. go after a loan shark who sends his deadly driver out to kill anyone who stands in his way.
episodes.title: Custom Made Killer

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. help locate a racehorse believed dead by its beautiful owner, Maxine, before it is used to collect a gambling debt.
episodes.title: Knight by a Nose

episodes.synopsis: K.I.T.T. is nearly destroyed when it's dropped into an acid pit. Following extensive reconstruction, K.I.T.T. squares off against a monster truck.
episodes.title: Junk Yard Dog

episodes.synopsis: An employee-owned armored car company faces dissolution when a test driver is killed during a routine missile defense demonstration.
episodes.title: Buy Out

episodes.synopsis: When an accident claims the life of a laborer who was working on the construction of a government space weapons headquarters, Michael investigates.
episodes.title: Knightlines

episodes.synopsis: When Michael learns that the sponsor of a small-town road rally is being pressured into canceling the event, Michael and K.I.T.T. pose as competitors.
episodes.title: The Nineteenth Hole

episodes.synopsis: When a scientist's daughter is kidnapped by thieves seeking a new high-tech laser, Michael and K.I.T.T. recruit FLAG's resident computer nerd to help.
episodes.title: Knight & Knerd

episodes.synopsis: When a ruthless corporation resorts to intimidation and murder to force a group of independent truckers out of business, Michael and K.I.T.T. step in.
episodes.title: Ten Wheel Trouble

episodes.synopsis: When blackmail turns into the murder of Bonnie's close friend, Michael poses as a scientist to gain entrance to an exclusive retreat.
episodes.title: Knight in Retreat

episodes.synopsis: When several stolen laser rifles turn up at a popular gun convention, Michael goes undercover as a survival enthusiast to sniff out the thieves.
episodes.title: Knight Strike

episodes.synopsis: When a freak accident claims the life of an aerial performer, Michael and K.I.T.T. go undercover as a daredevil act to find out if foul play is afoot.
episodes.title: Circus Knights

episodes.synopsis: Its armor compromised while on assignment, K.I.T.T. faces destruction by Juggernaut, a superior armored vehicle owned by a terrorist.
episodes.title: Knight of the Juggernaut: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After K.I.T.T. is demolished by Juggernaut, a miracle-working mechanic fixes K.I.T.T. up, making it even smarter and faster than before.
episodes.title: Knight of the Juggernaut: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Michael's efforts to apprehend an elusive criminal are thrown for a loop when a friend is kidnapped as part of a plot to steal K.I.T.T.
episodes.title: KITTnap

episodes.synopsis: A former intelligence officer hijacks the plane Bonnie's traveling aboard and demands the release of a group of political prisoners.
episodes.title: Sky Knight

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. must locate a kidnapped archaeologist in order to help a group of Native Americans ward off a greedy oil company.
episodes.title: Burial Ground

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. must stop a notorious biker gang that's using the Foundation's high-tech mobile base truck to launch a dangerous crime spree.
episodes.title: The Wrong Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Michael and the Foundation use a tricked-out K.I.T.T. to lure into the open a man plotting to smuggle biological weapons out of the country.
episodes.title: Knight Sting

episodes.synopsis: Michael and K.I.T.T. leap into action when the Foundation learns that a black-market arms dealer has stolen the prototype of a high-tech hovercraft.
episodes.title: Many Happy Returns

episodes.synopsis: Michael poses as a race car driver to investigate a string of mysterious accidents that have plagued an Indy car racing team.
episodes.title: Knight Racer

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie poses as an inmate in a women's prison in order to investigate a string of ingenious robberies masterminded by the warden.
episodes.title: Knight Behind Bars

episodes.synopsis: RC3 needs Michael's help when a powerful real estate developer tries to take over the old neighborhood.
episodes.title: Knight Song

episodes.synopsis: Depressed after being nearly fatally shot by thugs, Michael finds new hope when he reunites with an old flame... until the gun-happy crooks return.
episodes.title: The Scent of Roses

episodes.synopsis: A disgruntled computer technician and former Foundation employee plans to hack into K.I.T.T.'s system and reprogram the super car to kill Michael.
episodes.title: Killer K.I.T.T

episodes.synopsis: When Michael investigates rival lumber companies, he uncovers a conspiracy involving the sale of pirated timber illegally cut from a national forest.
episodes.title: Out of the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Michael finds himself between a rock and a hard place when Bonnie develops a crush on a celebrity magician who may be the mastermind behind a murder.
episodes.title: Deadly Knightshade

episodes.synopsis: When Michael investigates the death of a sports reporter, he finds that the victim had incriminating information about a controversial boxing match.
episodes.title: Redemption of a Champion

episodes.synopsis: Michael, K.I.T.T. and RC3 track down a murderer who's planning to enter a secret dune buggy race in order to escape across the Mexican border.
episodes.title: Knight of a Thousand Devils

episodes.synopsis: When an arsonist uses a special all-terrain vehicle to elude Michael and K.I.T.T., Bonnie creates a surveillance drone to help even the playing field.
episodes.title: Hills of Fire

episodes.synopsis: While trying to free an American from a politically volatile Central American country, Michael finds himself captured and facing a firing squad.
episodes.title: Knight Flight to Freedom

episodes.synopsis: K.I.T.T. and Michael are summoned to a movie studio, where a series of on-set accidents has led to rumors that there's a studio phantom at work.
episodes.title: Fright Knight

episodes.synopsis: Devon asks Michael and K.I.T.T. to guard his friend's adopted son, a lad who may be the descendent of an ancient cult leader, from a kidnapping plot.
episodes.title: Knight of the Rising Sun

episodes.synopsis: While investigating several suspicious deaths that appear to be suicides, Michael uncovers a connection to a con artist posing as a voodoo priestess.
episodes.title: Voo Doo Knight
